entry: Groove Launcher is a metro-styled launcher designed for a customizable and sleek user experience. Users can personalize their launcher by adjusting tile sizes, changing tile positions, customizing the color theme, and setting their favorite wallpapers.
list_featuers_0: Metro-Style Interface: A clean & modern design inspired by Windows Phone 8.
list_featuers_1: Customizable Tiles: Drag and drop tiles, adjust their sizes, and move them around to fit your unique style.
list_featuers_2: Theme Customization: Change the color of the launcher to match your mood or aesthetic.
list_featuers_3: Wallpaper Personalization: Choose and set your own wallpapers to create a fully personalized setup.
paragraph_contributing_0: Contributions are most welcome! Feel free to submit issues and pull requests to help improve Groove Launcher.
list_paragraph_contributing_1: Create a new branch for your feature or bugfix.
list_paragraph_contributing_2: Submit a pull request when your code is ready.
paragraph_license: This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.
paragraph_contact_0: For any inquiries or feedback, feel free to reach out!
